script.name: Pulldown Menu Test
script.comments: Test for Menu Pull down for queue selection
script.content:
#@MetaDataStart ############################################################################################# # Define your user parameters in this section. For reference, see EPICenter bundled scripts. ############################################################################################# # Enter all CLI commands from here # @SectionStart ( description = "Queue Menu")
# @VariableFieldLabel ( description = "Please select customer queue", # type = String, # scope = global, # required = yes, # validValues=[s510,s610,s710]) set var customerqueue s710 show var customerqueue # @SectionEnd #@MetaDataEnd
configure access-list $customerqueue ports 2:7 ingress
script.creator: admin
